thread.title: Penns Woods Bancorp, Inc. Announces Quarterly Dividend

author: cnbc.com
title: Penns Woods Bancorp, Inc. Announces Quarterly Dividend
text:
WILLIAMSPORT, Pa., Feb. 27, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Richard A. Grafmyre CFP®, Chief Executive Officer of Penns Woods Bancorp, Inc., (NASDAQ:PWOD) has announced that the Company’s Board of Directors declared a first quarter 2018 cash dividend of $0.47 per share.
The dividend is payable March 27, 2018 to shareholders of record March 13, 2018.
About Penns Woods Bancorp, Inc.
Penns Woods Bancorp, Inc. is the bank holding company for Jersey Shore State Bank and Luzerne Bank. The banks serve customers in North Central and North Eastern Pennsylvania through their retail banking, commercial banking, mortgage services and financial services divisions. Penns Woods Bancorp, Inc. stock is listed on the NASDAQ National Market under the symbol PWOD.
Previous press releases and additional information can be obtained from the company’s website at www.jssb.com .
